name: ALTERNATIVE_PROCS
description: This table contains information about alternative procedures selected for patients.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for alternative procedure items.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: ID of the deployment owner for this contact.

columns.name: ALT_PROC_LMA_ID
columns.description: The identifier for the alternative procedure (LMA) record.

columns.name: ALT_PROC_LMA_ID_ALTERNATIVE_NAME
columns.description: This column contains the name of the alternative medication and procedure records.

columns.name: ALT_PROC_ORIG_ID
columns.description: Original procedure (EAP) ID.

columns.name: ALT_PROC_OPTION_C_NAME
columns.description: Alternative procedure option taken.

columns.name: ALT_PROC_USER_ID
columns.description: ID of user who ordered the alternative procedure.

columns.name: ALT_PROC_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: ALT_PROC_TIME
columns.description: Instant the alternative was taken.

columns.name: ALT_PROC_ORDER_ID
columns.description: Procedure (EAP) ID of the alternative procedure that was chosen.

columns.name: ALT_PROC_CLS_C_NAME
columns.description: Order class for alternative procedure.

columns.name: ALT_PROC_QUANTITY
columns.description: Quantity for alternative procedure.

columns.name: ALT_PROC_PRIO_C_NAME
columns.description: Priority of alternative procedure.

columns.name: ALT_PROC_REL_COST
columns.description: Relative cost of alternative procedure.

columns.name: ALT_PROC_WHEN_C_NAME
columns.description: When value for alternative procedure.

columns.name: ALT_PROC_FREQ_ID
columns.description: Frequency of alternative procedure.

columns.name: ALT_PROC_FREQ_ID_FREQ_NAME
columns.description: The name of the frequency record.

columns.name: ALT_PROC_COUNT
columns.description: Count value for alternative procedure.

columns.name: ALT_PROC_CONTINUE_C_NAME
columns.description: The continue reason category number for the alternative procedure alert.
